ModMetaData.name: Extend the Cat
ModMetaData.author: Udon
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a lot of cats in the game. The cat added in this mod has the following features. · Hauling · Nuzzles · Packing Animal · Carnivorous
Cats are found in many biomes, but each cats has its own biome.
A special item stash quest will occur when the cat is on your colony. In this quest, you will be able to get the "cat crystal". If you use the crystal in your cat, it will evolve into a special cat. Each evolved cat can use special skills.
